about_the_game:
Rusty Road Racing: The Perfect Blend of Nostalgia and Modern Rally Thrills

Rusty Road Racing seamlessly combines the nostalgic charm of classic cars with the intense excitement of modern rally racing. The game is easy to pick up, but its realistic physics modeling provides a challenge even for experienced drivers. Compete in iconic, rusty vintage cars and experience their authentic driving feel. Fine-tune your settings for each rally stage and enjoy the thrill of driving!

Game Features:

  • Realistic and Versatile Driving Simulation: Adjust the car's suspension and gearbox to find the perfect settings for each rally stage. The realistic physics ensures a true-to-life driving experience.

  • Multiple Control Options: Rusty Road Racing supports a keyboard, gamepad, and steering wheel, allowing players to enjoy the driving experience in their preferred way.

  • Local Multiplayer: Invite your friends to local multiplayer and take turns competing in different rally events. Up to eight players can participate locally.

TV Director Mode and Replay Recording

  • TV Director Role: Take control and become a TV director! Manage rally broadcast cameras and create cinematic viewing experiences. Set camera positions and choose the best angles to create exciting replays of your completed rally stages.

  • Replay Recording and Playback: Save all your driving sessions and replay them anytime. Review your performances, share recordings easily, and challenge your friends to improve their skills. Compete to see who has the best driving abilities!

Car Collisions and Damage

Experience realistic crashes and car damage during your races! Rusty Road Racing’s advanced physics modeling provides lifelike driving characteristics and showcases realistic vehicle damage. See how every off-road mishap and collision affects your car’s condition: panels bend, bumpers fall off, and windows shatter.

Competition and Community

Rusty Road Racing offers a comprehensive competitive environment where you can aim for the best times across various rally stages and events. Challenge your friends locally or compete for rankings on the global leaderboard. Enjoy diverse racing scenarios where every split-second decision counts.

Rusty Road Racing invites you to unforgettable rally experiences that blend the charm of classic cars with the excitement of modern driving simulation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.5GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 650 or equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 or equivalent

short_description: A fun rally simulator focusing on car physics modeling, tire skidding, and suspension functionality! Full camera customization, recording, and sharing features! Incredible turns and jumps await drivers who are crazy enough!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Romanian
*languages with full audio support
